spanish-language.name: Spanish
spanish-language.description:
<cy>ENG</c>: Translates most of the mod's dialogue in Spanish. Due to character limitations, there will be spelling errors.

<cy>ESP</c>: Traduce mayor parte del dialogo del mod en Espanol. Dado a las limitaciones de caracteres en el juego, habran errores ortograficos (como la falta de acentos)

hide-upcoming.name: Hide upcoming
hide-upcoming.description:
<cy>ENG</c>: Hides icons that are tagged as upcoming (thus impossible to get for now).

<cy>SPA</c>: Oculta los iconos etiquetados como proximos (por tanto, imposibles de conseguir por ahora).

show-more-games.name: Show Fanmades
show-more-games.description: Disable this if you want to have access to the Online Menu. (This will be removed on the official release)

skip-requirements.name: Skip requirements
skip-requirements.description: Disables the requirements to unlock stuff (Like hollow's coin quota and such

reset-variables.name: Reset Mod Variables
reset-variables.description: Resets all the one-time events of the mod when you enter the Menu Layer. <cr>Only enable this</c> if you want to see the Dialogs and scenes.
